column1: Daily Weather Observations for Portland, Victoria for December 2024
Prepared at 05:36 UTC on Wednesday  4 December 2024   IDCJDW3068.202412
Most observations from Portland, evaporation and sunshine measured at Mount Gambier.
Some cloud observations are from automated equipment; these are somewhat different to those made by a human observer and may not appear every day.
Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, cloud and rainfall observations are from Portland Airport {station 090171}
Evaporation and sunshine observations are from Mount Gambier Aero {station 026021}
